Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for the virtual network, including IP address ranges, subnets, and connectivity needs with on-premises networks.
Create a design for the virtual network architecture, including subnets, network security groups, and routing configurations.
Use the Azure portal or CLI to create the virtual network with the defined IP address range and subnets.
Create and configure subnets within the virtual network, ensuring proper segmentation and addressing.
Create and configure NSGs to control inbound and outbound traffic to the virtual network and its subnets.
Establish peering connections with other virtual networks as needed for resource sharing and communication.
Set up route tables to manage traffic flow within the virtual network and to external networks.
Enable encryption for the virtual network to secure data in transit, following best practices for network security.
Set up monitoring for the virtual network using Azure Monitor and configure alerts for network performance and security events.
Document the virtual network architecture, configurations, and operational procedures. Conduct training for the operations team.
Ensure the virtual network setup meets compliance requirements and implement regular auditing procedures.
Utilize Azure Monitor to continuously track the performance metrics of the virtual network, including latency, packet loss, and throughput. Investigate any anomalies.
Analyze network traffic patterns using Azure Network Watcher to identify any unusual activity or bottlenecks. Implement changes as necessary.
Regularly back up the configurations of virtual networks, including subnets and NSGs, to ensure quick recovery in case of misconfigurations or failures.
Conduct failover tests to ensure that redundant paths and configurations are functioning correctly and can take over in case of primary path failures.
Perform regular compliance checks to ensure that the virtual network setup adheres to relevant regulations and internal security policies.
Ensure the operations team participates in regular training sessions to stay updated with new features, best practices, and security measures related to Azure Virtual Network.
